name: GNOME Speech2Text
description:
Local speech-to-text for GNOME Shell using whisper.cpp. Record audio with a keyboard shortcut, transcribe it locally using Whisper models, and insert the text at your cursor or copy to clipboard. Requires installing a companion D-Bus service (installer included). Forked from kavehtehrani/gnome-speech2text.

This extension accesses the clipboard to copy transcribed text.
author: Bartek Celary
